Posted By: SpliffWizard (5/8/2012 12:34:13 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Soul Warden PLUS gather the townsfolk after fateful hour is active nets you the five humans in addition to five life, bumping your health past that five life death range.   
play with immolating souleater/tresspasser to nix your life to lower numbers when neaded. With New Phyrexia still in standard, I can see some devastating plays, and easy ways to make the lower life total either cancel out or be completely irrelevant.
posts.html:
Soul Warden PLUS gather the townsfolk after fateful hour is active nets you the five humans in addition to five life, bumping your health past that five life death range.
play with immolating souleater/tresspasser to nix your life to lower numbers when neaded. With New Phyrexia still in standard, I can see some devastating plays, and easy ways to make the lower life total either cancel out or be completely irrelevant.

Posted By: RAV0004 (1/27/2012 2:59:17 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I have but one thing to say for the Fateful Hour mechanic: [Form of the Dragon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Form of the Dragon). Casual ownage, here I come!  
  
EDIT: After having played my Dragon Cult Fateful Hour deck a few times, I've found that it exceeds expectations. I even survived an infinite [Pyromantics](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Pyromantics) combo by playing a [Faith's Shield](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Faith's Shield) when I got to 5 life, and just watched the fireworks, then swung for the win.
posts.html:
I have but one thing to say for the Fateful Hour mechanic: Form of the Dragon. Casual ownage, here I come!

EDIT: After having played my Dragon Cult Fateful Hour deck a few times, I've found that it exceeds expectations. I even survived an infinite Pyromantics combo by playing a Faith's Shield when I got to 5 life, and just watched the fireworks, then swung for the win.

posts.post_content: I'm thinking these would be good with [Tainted Sigil](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tainted Sigil), mostly if you use [Immolating Souleater](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Immolating Souleater) as a beater in the same deck. You pay a bunch of life, swing for 8-10. Play this and the sigil (or already have the sigil out) and get 5 dudes and gain 8-10 life for your troubles (probably)

Rating:

posts.post_content:
Stop with the comparisons to [dragon fodder](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=dragon fodder). Can humans be sacrificed to [goblin grenade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=goblin grenade)? Can your friends repeatedly make you groan with {[fodder launch](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=fodder launch)? I didn't think so.   
Humans have better tribal recently, but with the amount of shenanigans goblin decks get up to in past sets, no one should compare this to dragon fodder.
posts.html:
